title: Fireman Sam. Spot of bother
brief_description: There’s never a dull moment for Fireman Sam and his friends in four more delightful stories. “Dilys’ Forgetful Day”: Dilys loses her memory; and firefighter Penny Morris is introduced to Pontypandy’s Fire Service. “Halloween”: It’s Halloween in Pontypandy, with tricks and treats for everybody. “Spot of Bother”: Norman fakes chicken pox to avoid a spelling test. “Norman’s Pitfall”: Norman falls down an old coal mine shaft - just as well there’s more than one way out!
